name: Phantasium
description:
GAMEPLAY 
Use W A S  and D keys to move, mouse to look, E to interact, and Tab for inventory. Speak to characters on the ship to learn about them, and learn what item they need found to be released from limbo. Explore the ship and find all the items. Avoid the mysterious lady, she will occasionally hunt for you. You must either avoid her for the duration of the chase, or find Some Poor Soul to distract her. 

In Phantasium, you are a lost soul on a 1940's vessel helping ghosts get out of limbo in an attempt to win a bet against a mysterious woman with unknown motives. 

The game is first person with some interaction. WASD and mouse control only. It was created within 3 months with a class of high school students for fun.
